name: Jim Packard
introduction: James "Jim" Packard (born 23 September 1931 and died 1 October 1960) was an American racecar driver who participated in the USAC Championship Car series from 1958 until his death in 1960. He attempted to qualify for the 1959 and 1960 Indianapolis 500, which would have earned him results towards the Formula One championship. However, he was not able to qualify.
